TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, It turns out they are correct

I wish to know the answers to every question

Granted, but now you'll never have the wonder of learning something new.

I wish I could get KSP to run longer between crashes. (The program, not the rockets. THOSE don't crash very often for me! )

Granted but it only works if you don't input any commands

I wish to know who I am

Granted, you are a spy from a human eating alien civilization.

I wish I had a better CPU.

Granted but your power supply can't handle the extra load and causes a fatal systems crash

I wish i had something better to do with my time

granted, that thing turns out to be dying of a meteor landing on you

i wish that my laptop battery lasted longer

Your laptop battery lasts longer... when doing you mom.

I wish I didn't wish this wish.

Granted. You wish you wish that wish. You wish you didn't wish it. You wish you wished it...

lady wishes on fire screaming "son war back plese"

[]

Edited August 2, 2019 by CvVtjRtb

Granted. Unfortunately, "Us :3" is the name of a new companion, and the doctor only saves "Us :3." from the daleks.

I wish Putin got eaten by gigantic fungi.

Granted. This fungi enslaves Humanity

I wish to get into ALL the courses for High School I want next year

Granted, but you now spend so much time doing homework, you have no time for KSP.

I wish for a HUVR board.

I have no idea what that is, so have a really bad PC.

I wish to know what the definition of what is.

http://dictionary.reference.com/browse/what?s=t

I wish I could kill the gigantic Fungi and be a national hero

Granted. It rises again a month later.

I wish I was a little bit taller, I wish I was a balla, etc.

A little is a lot. You are now a 67 metre tall ball named A.

lady wishes asay iit.sss. . hi i wish for tews.

Granted. You are beset upon by a horde of ravenous, rabid dogs, collectively named TEWS. You will not escape.

I wish I wasn't so terrified of everything all the time.

granted, but nothingness becomes deadly and is your new fear.

I wish my computer had on-par graphics with gaming computers...

Granted. Your computer's graphics begin the long and arduous process of learning golf, in order to match up against the gaming computers (which, naturally, play golf already). The struggle is long and almost endless, and you are cursed to be caddy to your computer until its destiny is fulfilled -- achieving a par score on the toughest golf course in the universe.

I wish English would stop making words mean six different things.

Granted. So many new words appear due to this that everything almost instantly becomes incomprehensible.

I wish that more people would watch my YouTube channel.

Granted, you get 1 million dislikes on each video.

I wish NASA actually did something awesome with manned spaceflight again.

Granted, but it results in mass involuntary recruitment and leads to a violent space-race that ends in global thermonuclear war.

I wish I could physics better.

Granted, you become basically a god and every single physics oversimplification in KSP appears in real life. An aircraft crashes, and its engines bounce around.

u

What? Granted, I guess...

I wish for a Sanik.

Granted, but this Sanik the Hegehoge rolls away.

I wish for anti-spoder spray.
